con:testCase.name: BaseFlow_CreateResource
con:testCase.con:description:
Create ServiceGroup-Basic Flow-Admin Service Group specified.
- Send PutServiceGroup request for a new receiver participant: duplet participantIdentifier + participantIndentifierScheme. Request is sent within the same network as the SMP. - The URI and attached XML are correctly formed. Certificate of AdminServiceGroup is specified in the HTTP header. - The sender has "Admin SMP" priveledges (via credentials). -> HTTP Response code 201 is returned. -> The correct data is inserted in the DB: ServiceGroup table. Also, Service Group is linked to the Admin Service group. - Send GetServiceGroup for the initial participant duplet (verify that service group is correctly created). -> HTTP Response code 200 is returned. The same previously pushed service goupe is returned. - Send PutServiceMetadata request with certificate of AdminServiceGroup (verify service group is linked to its admin). -> HTTP Response code 200 is returned.

con:property.con:name: ExpectedResponsePutResourceXSD_INVALIDParticipantIDOccurence2
con:property.con:value: Participant identifiers don't match between URL parameter

con:testCase.name: SMP_2.0_031-Delete ServiceMetadata-Basic Flow
con:testCase.con:description:
Create ServiceGroup-Basic Flow-Admin Service Group specified.
- Send PutServiceGroup request for a new receiver participant: duplet participantIdentifier + participantIndentifierScheme. Request is sent within the same network as the SMP. - The URI and attached XML are correctly formed. Certificate of AdminServiceGroup is specified in the HTTP header. - The sender has "Admin SMP" priveledges (via credentials). -> HTTP Response code 201 is returned. -> The correct data is inserted in the DB: ServiceGroup table. Also, Service Group is linked to the Admin Service group. - Send GetServiceGroup for the initial participant duplet (verify that service group is correctly created). -> HTTP Response code 200 is returned. The same previously pushed service goupe is returned. - Send PutServiceMetadata request with certificate of AdminServiceGroup (verify service group is linked to its admin). -> HTTP Response code 200 is returned.

con:testCase.name: SMP_2.0_069-Create ServiceMetadata-No serviceGroup present
con:testCase.con:description:
Create ServiceGroup-Basic Flow-Admin Service Group specified.
- Send PutServiceGroup request for a new receiver participant: duplet participantIdentifier + participantIndentifierScheme. Request is sent within the same network as the SMP. - The URI and attached XML are correctly formed. Certificate of AdminServiceGroup is specified in the HTTP header. - The sender has "Admin SMP" priveledges (via credentials). -> HTTP Response code 201 is returned. -> The correct data is inserted in the DB: ServiceGroup table. Also, Service Group is linked to the Admin Service group. - Send GetServiceGroup for the initial participant duplet (verify that service group is correctly created). -> HTTP Response code 200 is returned. The same previously pushed service goupe is returned. - Send PutServiceMetadata request with certificate of AdminServiceGroup (verify service group is linked to its admin). -> HTTP Response code 200 is returned.

con:testCase.name: SMP_2.0_077-Basic Flow-BlueCote ampersound
con:testCase.con:description:
Create ServiceGroup-Basic Flow-Admin Service Group specified.
- Send PutServiceGroup request for a new receiver participant: duplet participantIdentifier + participantIndentifierScheme. Request is sent within the same network as the SMP. - The URI and attached XML are correctly formed. Certificate of AdminServiceGroup is specified in the HTTP header. - The sender has "Admin SMP" priveledges (via credentials). -> HTTP Response code 201 is returned. -> The correct data is inserted in the DB: ServiceGroup table. Also, Service Group is linked to the Admin Service group. - Send GetServiceGroup for the initial participant duplet (verify that service group is correctly created). -> HTTP Response code 200 is returned. The same previously pushed service goupe is returned. - Send PutServiceMetadata request with certificate of AdminServiceGroup (verify service group is linked to its admin). -> HTTP Response code 200 is returned.

con:property.con:name: oldId
con:property.con:value: SMP002-Create ServiceGroup-Basic Flow-Admin SMP is Admin ServiceGroup

con:property.con:name: Description
con:property.con:value: Simple Flow with admin user : 1- Resource Creation; 2- Read Created Resource, 4- Create Subresource, 5- Read Subresource, 6- Delete Created SubResource, 7- Delete Created Resource

con:testCase.name: SMP-2.0_072-EDELIVERY-1977-Secure BlueCoat authentication-Spring Security
con:testCase.con:description:
Create ServiceGroup-Basic Flow-Admin Service Group specified.
- Send PutServiceGroup request for a new receiver participant: duplet participantIdentifier + participantIndentifierScheme. Request is sent within the same network as the SMP. - The URI and attached XML are correctly formed. Certificate of AdminServiceGroup is specified in the HTTP header. - The sender has "Admin SMP" priveledges (via credentials). -> HTTP Response code 201 is returned. -> The correct data is inserted in the DB: ServiceGroup table. Also, Service Group is linked to the Admin Service group. - Send GetServiceGroup for the initial participant duplet (verify that service group is correctly created). -> HTTP Response code 200 is returned. The same previously pushed service goupe is returned. - Send PutServiceMetadata request with certificate of AdminServiceGroup (verify service group is linked to its admin). -> HTTP Response code 200 is returned.
